title: Organic Ashwagandha 1300mg with Black Pepper | Premium Ashwagandha Root Extract | Stress Relief, Anxiety Support, Energy & Mood Enhancement | Adaptogenic Supplement - 60 Capsules
descriptionHtml:
Organic Ashwagandha - Premium Stress Relief & Vitality

Find balance and resilience with our Organic Ashwagandha 1300mg, one of the most powerful adaptogenic herbs in Ayurvedic medicine. This high-potency formula helps reduce stress and anxiety, boost energy, enhance mood, support cognitive function, and promote overall wellness. Enhanced with organic black pepper for maximum absorption.

Key Benefits

  • Reduces Stress & Anxiety: Clinically proven to lower cortisol levels and reduce stress response
  • Enhances Energy & Vitality: Combats fatigue and supports sustained energy without stimulants
  • Supports Mood Balance: Promotes positive mood and emotional well-being
  • Improves Sleep Quality: Helps calm the mind for better rest and recovery
  • Cognitive Function: Supports memory, focus, and mental clarity
  • Immune Support: Strengthens natural immune defenses
  • Muscle Strength & Recovery: Supports athletic performance and muscle building
  • Hormonal Balance: Supports thyroid and reproductive hormone health

Premium Organic Formula

  • Organic Ashwagandha Root (1300mg): High-potency dose of pure Withania somnifera root for maximum adaptogenic benefits
  • Organic Black Pepper (10mg): Enhances absorption and bioavailability of ashwagandha's active compounds

What is Ashwagandha?

Ashwagandha, also known as "Indian Ginseng" or "Winter Cherry," is one of the most important herbs in Ayurvedic medicine. Used for over 3,000 years, it's classified as an adaptogen - helping your body manage and adapt to stress. Modern research confirms its benefits for:

  • Stress and anxiety reduction
  • Cortisol regulation
  • Energy and stamina
  • Cognitive function
  • Immune system support
  • Hormonal balance

Perfect For

  • Chronic stress or anxiety
  • Fatigue and low energy
  • Sleep difficulties
  • Brain fog or poor concentration
  • Athletes seeking recovery support
  • Hormonal imbalances
  • Overall wellness and longevity

Suggested Use: Take 2 capsules daily with meals or as directed by your healthcare provider. Best results with consistent use over 4-8 weeks.

Quality Assurance: 100% Organic Ashwagandha root. Vegan pullulan capsules. No fillers, binders, or artificial additives.
shortDescriptionHtml: Reduce stress and boost energy with Organic Ashwagandha 1300mg. Premium adaptogenic supplement supports anxiety relief, mood balance, cognitive function, and overall vitality. Enhanced with black pepper for absorption. 60 capsules.
supplementFacts:
